document_data.name: Lavhelhar's
document_data.type: Inn{{Cite web/Forging the Realms/Bringing a City to Life}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Lavhelhar's''' was an inn in the city of [[Iliphanar]] in [[Semphar]].
document_data.Location: Lavhelhar's was located at the very center of Iliphanar.
document_data.Services: The inn was noted as Iliphanar's most expensive and snobbish establishment.
